Now, I need to check the "post- season record" column for that row. In the table, under the post-season record column for 2013, there are two dashes "--", which typically indicate no data or not applicable. This suggests that Kansas City did not have any post-season games or results in that year.

Additionally, looking at the "post- season win %" column for 2013 also shows "--", reinforcing the idea that there was no post-season participation or record to report.

So putting it all together: The claim states that Kansas City had no post-season record in 2013. According to the table, the relevant row for 2013 under the "post- season record" and "post- season win %" columns shows "--", which supports the claim. Therefore, the statement is TRUE.

To summarize my findings:
- The 2013 row with Kansas City as the affiliate has "--" in both post-season related columns.
- This indicates there was no post-season activity for Kansas City that year.
